name: Fort Lytton Pirates Life
description:
**HTC VIVE REQUIRED**

Explore the area of Fort Lytton! Your captain has ordered you to collect his equipment on this small island fort. Swing swords, shoot flintlock pistols and fire cannons all while exploring the pirate themed Fort Lytton.

Controls:

-Use grip buttons to pickup and drop objects

-Use the touch pad button to teleport

-Use the triggers to shoot flintlock pistols

Created By Peter Love
